001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.impl.DefaultContainerFlagSupport;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.EQNameFactory;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
013
014import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
015import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
016
017import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
018import java.util.LinkedList;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Map;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
024
025public class FlagContainerBuilder<T extends IFlagInstance> implements IFlagContainerBuilder<T> {
026  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(FlagContainerBuilder.class);
027
028  @Nullable
029  private final Integer jsonKeyIndex;
030  @NonNull
031  private final List<T> flags;
032
033  /**
034   * Construct a new flag container using the provided flag qualified name as the
035   * JSON key.
036   *
037   * @param jsonKeyIndex
038   *          the qualified name index of the JSON key or {@code null} if no JSON
039   *          key is configured
040   */
041  public FlagContainerBuilder(@Nullable Integer jsonKeyIndex) {
042    this.jsonKeyIndex = jsonKeyIndex;
043    this.flags = new LinkedList<>();
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  @NonNull
048  public IFlagContainerBuilder<T> flag(@NonNull T instance) {
049    flags.add(instance);
050    return this;
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public IContainerFlagSupport<T> build() {
055    IContainerFlagSupport<T> retval;
056    if (flags.isEmpty()) {
057      retval = IContainerFlagSupport.empty();
058    } else {
059      Map<Integer, T> flagMap = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(ObjectUtils.notNull(flags.stream()
060          .collect(
061              CustomCollectors.toMap(
062                  flag -> flag.getQName().getIndexPosition(),
063                  CustomCollectors.identity(),
064                  FlagContainerBuilder::handleShadowedInstances,
065                  LinkedHashMap::new))));
066
067      T jsonKey = jsonKeyIndex == null ? null : flagMap.get(jsonKeyIndex);
068      retval = new DefaultContainerFlagSupport<>(flagMap, jsonKey);
069    }
070    return retval;
071  }
072
073  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
074  private static <INSTANCE extends IFlagInstance> INSTANCE handleShadowedInstances(
075      @NonNull Integer keyIndex,
076      @NonNull INSTANCE shadowed,
077      @NonNull INSTANCE shadowing) {
078    if (!shadowed.equals(shadowing) && LOGGER.isErrorEnabled()) {
079      IModelDefinition owningDefinition = shadowing.getContainingDefinition();
080      IModule module = owningDefinition.getContainingModule();
081      LOGGER.error("Unexpected duplicate flag instance name '%s' in definition '%s' in module name '%s' at '%s'",
082          EQNameFactory.instance().get(keyIndex).or(null),
083          owningDefinition.getDefinitionQName(),
084          module.getShortName(),
085          module.getLocation());
086    }
087    return shadowing;
088  }
089}
